# MasterGit Learning System

This is a React TypeScript learning management system for Git education with:
- Login/Registration pages with Git-themed styling
- Dashboard showing student progress
- Module pages with sessions and progress tracking
- Test pages with multiple question types
- Mocked data structure for 3 Git learning modules

## Styling Guidelines
- Primary background: #f5faff
- Accent color: #ff6742 (orange)
- Git-themed color scheme throughout
- Responsive design with sidebar navigation

## Architecture
- TypeScript + React with routing
- Mocked data in services/mockedData folder
- Separate files for each module's data
- Component-based structure with reusable elements
